name: Serbia SPP-001
desc: Located in South of Novi Sad, Serbia. This power plant has 880 photovoltaic module and produces 43.000 KWH per month. The installed power is 360 kwp and the power plant is currently 6 years old.

name: Brazil SPP-001
desc: Located in Belem, Brazil this is a very small microgrid consisting of only 4 photovoltaic modules. This is a brand new installation, from July 2024.

name: Canada SPP-001
desc: Located in North of Vancouver in British Colombia. This facility has 12 photovoltaic modules and produces 800 KWH per month. The installed power is 6 kwp and the facility is currently 2 years old.

name: Serbia SPP-002
desc: Located in Novi Sad, Serbia. This power plant has 20 photovoltaic modules and produces 1.500 KWH per month. The installed power is 11 kwp and the facility is currently 1 year old.

name: Macedonia SPP-001
desc: Located in Skopje, Macedonia. This facility has 18 photovoltaic modules and produces 1.300 KWH per month. The installed power is 10 kwp and the facility is currently 2 year old.

name: Greece SPP-001
desc: Located in Kavala, Greece. This facility has 10 photovoltaic modules and produces 9000 KWH per month. The installed power is 1,5 kwp and the facility is currently 4 year old.
